statements: DELETE FROM election_results WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democratic' AND votes_received < 5000;
DELETE FROM election_results WHERE election_id = 100 AND party_affiliation = 'Independent';
DELETE FROM voter_demographics WHERE age < 30 AND region = 'West';
DELETE FROM election_results WHERE election_year = 2016 AND party_affiliation = 'Independent';
DELETE FROM voter_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' AND region = 'West Coast';
DELETE FROM election_participants WHERE election_id = 1001 AND party_id = 1 AND district_id = 5;
DELETE FROM election_parties WHERE party_name = 'Green Party';
